task.summary: Default task
Created procedure to filter/view menu on customer side. Created web layout of filter function.
Removed inheritance of menu item and item due to misunderstanding of inherited methods and fixed output bug where nothing was being displayed.

Readjusted menu controller, menu view and showMenu model interactions. Created page to view details of an item clicked on from menu page by passing through the id to viewItem.php and passing it through procedure to recall details because passing it as a whole object caused an error.
Readjusted customer navigation bar to look more tidier. Added nav bar to all appropiate customer pages
Added admin functionality to view all items whether withdrawn/sale , cake/drink

moved function to display items into a controller so withdrawn, sale and all items pages can use the same function. Swapped a select all statement with a procedure instead to get items that are sale, withdrawn or both.
Admin functionality to add a new item added
Change status of an item through a button after viewing all details of an item (but not edit the details)
Save changes on an editted item added as Admin
Added user functionality to cancel an order item in basket
Added user functionality to cancel an order that has not been delivered yet
Added user functionality to favourite an item
Added user functionality to allow multiple orders to be made in one session.
Extended menu functionality by adding a default menu of all sale items to look at before filtering
Added javascript alerts for invalid data input in selling price and buying price inputs such as checking if it is a number and above 0 as well as checking if selling price is higher than buying price
Added data validating using php when creating or editting an item's details
Added javascript to give a confirm box when leave button of user navbar is pressed. If confirm button is pressed and the order has not been confirmed yet it will be cancelled
Fixed cancel order bug due to clash with start_session() being in multiple files
Added a trigger where items of a stock are automatically updated when an order has been delivered. Used a css template to restyle the overall home page for both admin and customer
Added filter function for giving giving a report on order items as admin. Added css styling to make information more visually nice.

MESSAGE.value: Created procedure to filter/view menu on customer side. Created web layout of filter function.
Removed inheritance of menu item and item due to misunderstanding of inherited methods and fixed output bug where nothing was being displayed.

Readjusted menu controller, menu view and showMenu model interactions. Created page to view details of an item clicked on from menu page by passing through the id to viewItem.php and passing it through procedure to recall details because passing it as a whole object caused an error.
Readjusted customer navigation bar to look more tidier. Added nav bar to all appropiate customer pages
Added admin functionality to view all items whether withdrawn/sale , cake/drink

moved function to display items into a controller so withdrawn, sale and all items pages can use the same function. Swapped a select all statement with a procedure instead to get items that are sale, withdrawn or both.
Admin functionality to add a new item added
Change status of an item through a button after viewing all details of an item (but not edit the details)
Save changes on an editted item added as Admin
Added user functionality to cancel an order item in basket
Added user functionality to cancel an order that has not been delivered yet
Added user functionality to favourite an item
Added user functionality to allow multiple orders to be made in one session.
Extended menu functionality by adding a default menu of all sale items to look at before filtering
Added javascript alerts for invalid data input in selling price and buying price inputs such as checking if it is a number and above 0 as well as checking if selling price is higher than buying price
Added data validating using php when creating or editting an item's details
Added javascript to give a confirm box when leave button of user navbar is pressed. If confirm button is pressed and the order has not been confirmed yet it will be cancelled
Fixed cancel order bug due to clash with start_session() being in multiple files
Added a trigger where items of a stock are automatically updated when an order has been delivered. Used a css template to restyle the overall home page for both admin and customer
Added filter function for giving giving a report on order items as admin. Added css styling to make information more visually nice.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added filter function for giving giving a report on order items as admin. Added css styling to make information more visually nice.
